description: This hoisin seitan stir-fry recipe makes for a sweet yet spicy vegan dish that can be on the table in just 15 minutes.
name: Hoisin Seitan Stir Fry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium capsicums, green and red, sliced
2 large spring onions, sliced, green tips reserved

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk together the ingredients for the sauce in a bowl and set aside.
Heat half the oil in the wok on a medium high heat and fry the seitan cubes on all sides until crisp and golden, 5-7 minutes.
Add the remaining oil to the wok along with the carrots and capsicums and cook for 2-3 minutes to soften slightly, then add the spring onions and cook for 1 minute.
Pour the sauce into the wok, tossing to coat everything well. Reduce the heat and cook with the lid on for 3 minutes until the sauce has reduced.
Serve in bowls with rice and sliced spring onions and crushed peanuts on top.
